reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Minister of State for Infrastructure Expected Results for the 2020/2021 Fiscal Year Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation applies to the Minister of State for Infrastructure for the 2020/2021 fiscal year.
In this regulation, Act means the Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act.
The expected results that the Minister of State for Infrastructure is to achieve for the purposes of section 5 (3) of the Act are as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: work with the Minister of Transportation and Infrastructure to develop a plan that will advance critical transportation infrastructure;

support the work of the TransLink Mayors' Council 10-year planning process to extend the Millennium Line to Arbutus Street, with an eventual terminus at UBC, and ensure prompt design and construction of the Surrey-Langley Skytrain;
support planning to improve the movement of goods and people in the Fraser Valley, including the widening of Highway 1;
advance the work to replace the Massey crossing;
support the work of the Pattullo Bridge Replacement Project to ensure a successful completion;
support the planning and development of key transit projects, like high-speed transit links for the North Shore and the expansion of rail up the Fraser Valley;
submit to Cabinet a report on the results referred to in paragraphs (a) through (f) on or before March 31, 2021.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act, S.B.C. 2001, c. 28, s. 9.]
